document_data.name: Bookworm Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bookworm Inn''' was an inn in the city of [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: It stood near the [[Velti'Enorethal]], a school of [[elf|elven]] culture and [[magic]].<ref>
document_data.Atmosphere: It was a small, sedate, and peaceful place and, as evidenced by its name and locale, its patrons were mostly students and scholars from out of town. Conversation of course often turned toward history, religion, [[philosophy]], and other academic matters.
document_data.Services: It had a home brew of high quality.
